activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU:

Personal information that Sitel receives from the EU countries falls into two categories:

1.	Employee Data: (A) Data Controller: Sitel receives Human Resource data and general information about its associates (employees) in the application and employment process as data controller. This information is transferred to the U.S., for controlling purposes and storage.   (B) Data Processor:  Sitel also receives Human Resource data and general information about its associates (employees) in the application and employment process as data processor. This information is transferred to the U.S., for processing purposes and storage as instructed by its subsidiaries in EU countries.

No employee data is disclosed by Sitel, whether as controller or processor to any third party other than to data processors and sub-processors acting on Sitel's instructions.  Any transfer to such third parties complies fully with the safe harbor principles.

2.	Client Customer Data - Data Processor: Sitel collects personal information from customers on behalf of our clients and transfers this to the U.S. for further processing at the direction of our client. This personal data is the sole property of our clients, and Sitel does not own or control any of the data.
